definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Hong2 Shi2 zi4 hui4

definition: Cruciferae or Brassicaceae (taxonomic family including Brassica etc whose flowers have a cross of 4 petals)
to make the sign of the cross/to make a cross (on paper)
variant of 畫十字|画十字[hua4 shi2 zi4]

sentences.english: Now here’s Charlie, he’s come to the crossroads.
sentences.chinese: 那么现在查理，他也来到了十字路口。

sentences.english: His job was to drive a Red Cross truck carrying wounded away from battle.
sentences.chinese: 他在红十字会的工作是驾驶卡车，将伤患带离战场。

sentences.english: Make a cut in the shape of a cross in the bag with a cutter flamed .
sentences.chinese: 用火焰切割器在包装上切开一个十字形切口。

sentences.english: Had Jesus not died on the cross, Christianity would not have triumphed.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣要是不死在十字架上，基督教就无法取得胜利。

sentences.english: The plunger is clamped into the crosshead .
These crusaders understand that the world is a dangerous place.
sentences.chinese: 这些十字军明白这个世界是个危险的地方。

sentences.english: Suprun's project was done in collaboration with Germany's Red Cross.
sentences.chinese: 苏普伦的研究项目是同德国红十字会合作完成的。

sentences.english: The 120-degree CCPM is by far most popular among pilots of all levels.
sentences.chinese: 在各层水平的飞手中，目前120度十字盘最为流行。

sentences.english: Just cut a small cross in the plastic at the spot you will drill.
sentences.chinese: 先在塑料板上要钻孔的地方切一个小十字。

sentences.english: Cross-followed, each one a head-shaped screwdriver.
sentences.chinese: 另附有十字型，一字型起子头各一支。

sentences.english: Go down the street till the crossroads and turn left there.
sentences.chinese: 沿着这条路走到十字路口，向左拐。

sentences.english: Among the Basic techniques are cross-stitch, crewel work, and quilting.
sentences.chinese: 最基本的技巧是十字针锈和绗缝绣。

sentences.english: For though he was crucified through weakness, yet he liveth by the power of God.
sentences.chinese: 他因软弱被钉在十字架上，却因神的大能，仍然活着。

sentences.english: The seven colors hill always have crossing.
sentences.chinese: 七色的歧路总有十字路口。

sentences.english: I told him about the Dewey Decimal System for shelving books.
sentences.chinese: 我给他讲图书架的杜威十字分类法。

sentences.english: So point one, that’s what the Cross frees us from.
sentences.chinese: 因此，第一点就是“十字架将我们从何境地解放出来。
